official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway project to redesign and reconstruct the interchange connecting Interstate Routes I-395 and I-495 Springfield, Virginia, for the purpose of improving the safety of the interchange.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to redesign and reconstruct the interchange connecting Interstate Routes I-395 and I-495 in Springfield, Virginia, to improve its safety.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway project to redesign and reconstruct the interchange connecting Interstate Routes I-395 and I-495 Springfield, Virginia, for the purpose of improving the safety of the interchange.
